articles.title: Rs 9,000 crore-selloff! Infosys, Tech Mahindra on top of FII hate list in Q1 - Economic Times
articles.description: The June quarter shareholding pattern data shows that FIIs pared their stake in Infosys by another 165 bps to 33.44%. In the case of Tech Mahindra, which will report its Q1 results on Wednesday, FII holding went down by 118 bps to 25.69%.
